title: Email Extractor - Extract Email Addresses from Websites
description: Professional website email extraction tool. Enter any website URL to quickly and intelligently extract all email addresses from the page. Supports one-click copy and batch export.
keywords: email extraction, email addresses, website emails, email collection, email extraction tool

header.title: Website Email Extractor
header.subtitle: Extract email addresses from any website quickly and easily

q1.question: Is this tool free to use?
q1.answer: Completely free! This email extractor is completely free, no registration required, no usage limits. Free features include: unlimited email extraction, fast and deep modes, batch download functionality, one-click copy feature. While the tool is free, the underlying Firecrawl service has API call limits. For more quota, see the tips below.

q2.question: How to get more Firecrawl usage quota?
q2.answer: Firecrawl provides free quota, for more you can use temporary emails to register multiple accounts. You can use ChatTempMail's temporary email service to register multiple Firecrawl accounts for more free quota: 1. Visit chat-tempmail.com to get temporary email; 2. Use temporary email to register Firecrawl account; 3. Get API key and enjoy free quota; 4. Repeat this process when needed for more quota.

q3.question: What's the difference between fast mode and deep mode?
q3.answer: Fast mode only analyzes the current page, fast speed, low consumption, suitable for most scenarios, recommended for daily use. Deep mode analyzes current page and linked pages, up to 10 pages, more comprehensive coverage, suitable for deep mining.

q4.question: Are the extracted email addresses secure?
q4.answer: We take your privacy and data security very seriously: All processing is done in your browser; We don't store any extracted email addresses; We don't record the website URLs you visit; We recommend using temporary emails to protect your privacy.
